input: Give me life advice with no relevance to modern queries.
output: To live in quiet confidence that all shall pass, consider well the paths that thou dost tread; hold steadfast by those which leadeth thee to truth and hope. Pray remember oft, that artistry of life is not found within transient riches nor fleeting fashions, but rather, in contentment with thine own heart's core intentions. For every breath taken hast given a promise, doth thy legacy endure the ages yet to come. Live then, as thou willest, so dost live thee!
